name: ImpairmentInMemoryICD10CM
title: Impairment in Memory (ICD10CM)
description: This value set contains IC10CM billing codes for memory impairment.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains IC10CM billing codes for memory impairment.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify people diagnosed with memory impairment.),(Inclusion Criteria: ),(Exclusion Criteria: )

Cognitive deficits following other nontraumatic intracranial hemorrhage

Cognitive deficits following unspecified cerebrovascular disease
